channel.title: Help with posting pictures on the forums
channel.description: im not sure how to post pictures of my server on the forums.... ex: i want to put a pic of home belowe this message/ what do i do? some1 help please. Much appreciated

item.title: Help with posting pictures on the forums
item.dc:creator: @Mod_SMF Mod SMF
item.description:
@Mod_SMF wrote:

Step 1: Go to www.photobucket.com or www.imagehack.us
Step 2: Upload a picture u get an url from the picture like this:

www.photobucket.com/38041hdsa

then u do [ i m g ] url here [ / i m g [

IMG and [] WITH NO SPACES like this [img]

I hope it helps

Read full topic
item.source: Help with posting pictures on the forums

item.title: Help with posting pictures on the forums
item.dc:creator: @solargreg5 solargreg5
item.description:
@solargreg5 wrote:

First you click Print Screen(on your keyboard)
Then go to paint and click edit-paste
the click on the box things and outline the part of the pic u want and then right click and click add to pictures.
After that i would suggest go to photobucket and then register-click upload photos-click on the photo in “my pictures”- upload it save-click get img code and copy it then paste it to one of your topics or posts

Read full topic
item.source: Help with posting pictures on the forums

item.title: Help with posting pictures on the forums
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

  1. Upload the picture to photobucket, imageshack, or any other picture site you use.

Then click the button that says ‘Insert Image’ when your posting a reply, its under the italic button.

Then paste the link of the picture between the code bars.

Read full topic
item.source: Help with posting pictures on the forums
